content.query:
use FnO
go

create or alter view raw.vw_dBusinessUnit as 
  select t1.RecId as [Key]
        ,t1.OMOperatingUnitNumber as BU
        ,t1.Name as BusinessUnit 
    from raw.DirPartyTable t1 
   where t1.OMOperatingUnitType = 4 
     and t1.InstanceRelationType = 8363
go

-- Need to delete the storage in data lake
drop external table dw.dBusinessUnit
go

create external table dw.dBusinessUnit with (
    location = 'DataWarehouse/dBusinessUnit'
   ,data_source = ParquetStorage
   ,file_format = ParquetFormat
) as 
    select * from raw.vw_dBusinessUnit
go

-- select * from raw.vw_dBusinessUnit
-- select * from dw.dBusinessUnit
